name: Sample Report 4
query: select invoice_date as Date,invoice_number as `INV NO`,gst_number as `GST NO`,sac_code as `HSN / SAC CODE`,guest_name as `VENDOR NAME`,item_value_after_gst as `BASE AMOUNT`,gst_rate as `Rate`,tabItems.sgst_amount as`SGST`,tabItems.cgst_amount as`CGST`,tabItems.igst_amount as `IGSt`,tabItems.cgst_amount+tabItems.sgst_amount+tabItems.igst_amount as `Total`,DATE_FORMAT(invoice_date, '%%b-%%y') as `Invoice Month` from tabInvoices JOIN tabItems ON tabInvoices.name = tabItems.parent;
